de.jugs.cookbook
Class Global

java.lang.Object
  de.must.middle.GlobalStd
      de.jugs.cookbook.Global
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataObjectConstructionDetails
public class Global
extends GlobalStd

Container for global objects. To be used for shared use of any objects. This is session comprehensive. Sample: database connections or connections pools may be stored here.
